content: wee speedy 2 wee speedy 2 is a super-fast to knit baby sweater and only yarn mary gavans yarn hoodoo bulky takes a couple of hours or so to make from start to finish needle- 13 us 9 00 mm or what you need to get gauge 11 us 8 00 mm this is knit top down and you will only have 2 gauge 9 0 stitches = 4 inches ends to weave in yardage 90 yards sizes 6 months the adorable handmade hedgehog button can be found in notions 1 button the etsy shop katrinkles page 1 ws - wrong side rs - right side yo - yarn over pm - place marker k2tog- knit two stitches together kfb - knit into the front and back of the stitch 2 stitches in one stitch sm- slip marker cast on 33 stitches using a long tail cast on using the smaller needle row 1 ws knit to the end row 2 rs knit 1 kfb knit to the last 2 stitches kfb knit 1 35 stitches row 3 ws knit 8 front pm knit 5 sleeve pm knit 9 back pm knit 5 sleeve pm knit 8 front change to the larger needle row 4 rs knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb knit until you have 1 stitch before the next marker work 4 times knit to the end row 5 ws knit 3 purl to the last 3 stitches knit 3 work row 4 and 5 4 times total 67 stitches row 6 rs knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb knit until you have 1 stitch before the next marker work 4 times knit to the end 75 stitches row 7 ws knit 3 purl to the next marker sm knit to the next marker sm 2x purl to the last 3 stitches knit 3 row 8 rs button hole row k2tog yo knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm knit to the next marker sm kfb work 2 times knit to the end 79 stitches row 9 ws knit 3 purl to the next marker sm bind off the 15 sleeves stitches knit wise sm 2x purl to the last 3 stitches knit 3 49 stitches row 10 rs knit to the end row 11 ws knit 3 purl to the last 3 stitches knit 3 row 12 rs knit to the end repeat row 11 and 12 until the sweater measures 5 ½ from the underarm row 13 ws knit to the end row 14 rs knit to the end row 15 ws bind off knit wise finishing weave in ends sew the button on block and enjoy taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2015 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 2
